modShortDescription: Removes the Newbie Coat buff when spawning into a new game for the first time. It only works if you spawn into a world when this modlet is already loaded.
modDescription:
Removes the Newbie Coat buff when spawning into a new game for the first time.

## Notes

* If you add the mod after spawning, the existing Newbie Coat buff will not be removed.
* Doughphunghus believe other people have made modlet(s) like this? Let him know! Heâ€™ll happily deprecate his modlet if another exists with identical functionality that is being maintained!
